Interface DeckInterface


  • public interface DeckInterface
    Created by Keyan on 4/30/14. Interface for the Deck class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int cardsRemaining()
      Finds the size of the ArrayList, which signifies the number of elements left in the "deck".
      Card dealCard()
      Method removes the card in the first position of the ArrayList.
      void freshDeck()
      Creates the 52 Card object ArrayList with nested loops.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the ArrayList has anymore elements remaining.
      void shuffle()
      Randomizes the order of Card objects in the ArrayList.

    • Method Detail

      • freshDeck

        void freshDeck()
        Creates the 52 Card object ArrayList with nested loops. The cards are in order and must be randomized before use.

      • dealCard

        Card dealCard()
        Method removes the card in the first position of the ArrayList.
        Returns:
        Card object in the first position of the ArrayList.

      • cardsRemaining

        int cardsRemaining()
        Finds the size of the ArrayList, which signifies the number of elements left in the "deck".
        Returns:
        integer size of the ArrayList.

      • shuffle

        void shuffle()
        Randomizes the order of Card objects in the ArrayList.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the ArrayList has anymore elements remaining.
        Returns:
        true if there are no more elements in the ArrayList false if there are more elements
